text.tspan: เป็นภาพวาดสีนํ-ามันที1สร้างสรรค์ขึ-นโดย
First translate the input into English,
write a title for this article”
First translate the input into English,
classify the post into two classes”
“Carefully read the details of the article, noting the key events
and information provided, based on your understanding
of Julius Caesar's death on the course of history”
“Explore the basic components of an atom, then explain
how the components are organized and how they interact”
the question: where is the child
